resources.string: Hello! I am Huzaifa Ahmed, a software engineer based in Karachi, who enjoys building things that live on the internet. I develop exceptional websites and web apps that provide intuitive, pixel-perfect user interfaces with efficient and modern backends. During my graduation from Sir Syed UET, I joined the engineering team at AppBakerZ where I work on a wide variety of interesting and meaningful projects on a daily basis. Here\'s a few technologies I\'ve been working with recently: MERN (MongoDB ExpressJS React NodeJS) Stack developer with the passion of development and coding enthusiastic. If you would like a support with Firebase, React, React Native, WebPack, NodeJS/ExpressJS, MongoDB I will get right on it. I started development in 2015 and learn to code all by myself.
